item.description:
Happy Valentine's day eveyone！

Have you watched "Feichengwurao" the most popular live dating show in China? Are you looking for your Mr/Ms. right? There is a Chinese student dating event which has the similar format with "feichengwurao" to help people to find their bf/gf.

If you are interested in, please send an email including your name, age, sex, cell; phone number, interests, and 1-2 life pictures to meetyou.email@gmail.com. Or you can text the information to 857-389-9538 or 617-838-5096.

Event date: 7:30pm on 2/17/2013
Location:Northeastern University CSC318
Female/make guests qualifications: Age: 20-35, open mind, don't afraid to be rejected in front of 150 audiences. intermediate level of Mandarin. Please response SERIOUSLY!!

One of introduction of "Feichengwurao"

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n4ul7UjQ89c


One of episode from "Feichengwurao"
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hGxa8De4CG8

Event Poster:

http://www.meetyou.so/meetyou#.UR0FWmcsTWg

Good luck!!

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Fei Cheng WU Rao (非诚勿扰)-If you are the one
